name: 1 - Set out by surveyor & handover to Site Engineer completed
2 - All existing services exposed and identified before trenching
3 - Trench line and profile as per IFC drawings and as set out by surveyors
4 - Trench must be made safe before any person may enter the trench
Comments: Trench depth > 1.5m must be shored or battered.
5 - Base of trench inspected and tested if required.
6 - Ensure sufficient protection layer is placed around the new services cable
7 - Ensure warning tape and/or magslab is laid at the correct cover over the new services cable
8 - Ensure backfill material is suitable and un-contaminated
9 - Backfill compaction tested at every ____mm lift
10 - As-builts updated and surveyed when required
The above works have been inspected and are considered compliant with the drawings, specifications and instructions
